mapper.select: select * from tbl_review order by bno

select r.user_id, r.res_date, p.class_name, s.program_time, r.status, p.class_no from tbl_reservation r, tbl_program p , tbl_program_sub s where r.class_sub_no = s.program_sub_no and s.class_no = p.class_no and r.user_id = #{user_id} and r.status = #{status}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_review( bno, user_id, title, content, class_no) values(#{bno}, #{user_id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{class_no})
mapper.select: select file_name from tbl_attach where bno = #{bno}

choose.when: where title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
